act_info.full_title: Research Foundation Repeal Act, 2012, S.O. 2012, c. 8, Sched. 53
act_info.citation: Research Foundation Repeal Act, 2012, S.O. 2012, c. 8, Sched. 53

content.content: 1. ORTECH Corporation, formerly the Ontario Research Foundation, is dissolved and all its assets and liabilities are hereby transferred to and vested in the Crown in right of Ontario, without compensation. 2012, c. 8, Sched. 53, s. 1. 2. Omitted (provides for repeal of this Act). 2012, c. 8, Sched. 53, s. 2. 3. Omitted (amends, repeals or revokes other legislation). 2012, c. 8, Sched. 53, s. 3. 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2012, c. 8, Sched. 53, s. 4. 5. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 2012, c. 8, Sched. 53, s. 5. ______________ Français
content.raw_html:
1. ORTECH Corporation, formerly the Ontario Research Foundation, is dissolved and all its assets and liabilities are hereby transferred to and vested in the Crown in right of Ontario, without compensation. 2012, c. 8, Sched. 53, s. 1.

2. Omitted (provides for repeal of this Act). 2012, c. 8, Sched. 53, s. 2.

3. Omitted (amends, repeals or revokes other legislation). 2012, c. 8, Sched. 53, s. 3.

4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2012, c. 8, Sched. 53, s. 4.

5. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 2012, c. 8, Sched. 53, s. 5.

______________

Français
